channel.title: GST Blue Saffron
channel.description: A compilation of my research work based on books, workshops attended, interviews taken with my resources in Australia as well as India & my own practical experience of implementing GST since its inception in my own company Jani Plastics (www.janiplastics.com).
channel.itunes:author: Anup Jani

item.title: Episode 1: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to GST Blue Saffron podcast.
